movies.title: The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler
movies.plot: The erotic relationship between Zhashler's wife Karolina and unknown young man is not welcomed by the residents of a small village, which makes the situation unbearable. When Zhashler kills himself, desperate Karolina starts changing men in order to find a compatriot who would give her warmth and lustful love.
movies.simplePlot: The erotic relationship between Zhashler's wife Karolina and unknown young man is not welcomed by the residents of a small village, which makes the situation unbearable. When Zhashler kills...

biography.bio: Milena Zupancic was born on December 18, 1946 in Jesenice, Slovenia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Blossoms in Autumn (1973), Good to Go (2012) and The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976). She is married to Dusan Jovanovic. She was previously married to Radko Polic ( divorced ).
biography.name: Milena Zupancic

biography.placeOfBirth: Santa Croce, Trieste, Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy
biography.bio: Miranda Caharija was born on October 21, 1942 in Santa Croce, Trieste, Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy. She is an actress, known for The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976), Kill Me Gently (1979) and Radio.doc (1995).
biography.name: Miranda Caharija

biography.bio: Marjeta Gregorac was born on January 14, 1950 in Ljubljana, Slovenia. She is an actress, known for Time of the Gypsies (1988), The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976) and Idealist (1976).
biography.name: Marjeta Gregorac

biography.bio: Milena Muhic was born on June 2, 1937 in Maribor, Slovenia. She was an actress, known for The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976), My Dad, the Socialist Kulak (1987) and Veselo gostivanje (1984). She died on February 10, 2014 in Maribor.
biography.name: Milena Muhic

biography.placeOfBirth: Gorisnica pri Ptuju, Slovenia, Yugoslavia [now Gorinica, Slovenia]
biography.bio: Zlatko Sugman was born on August 28, 1932 in Gorisnica pri Ptuju, Slovenia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Beneath Her Window (2003), Don't Cry Peter (1964) and The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976). He died on December 16, 2008 in Ljubljana, Slovenia.
biography.name: Zlatko Sugman

biography.bio: Polde Bibic was born on February 3, 1933 in Maribor, Slovenia. He was an actor, known for My Dad, the Socialist Kulak (1987), Blossoms in Autumn (1973) and Dediscina (1984). He died on July 13, 2012 in Ljubljana, Slovenia.
biography.name: Polde Bibic

biography.bio: Boris Cavazza was born on February 2, 1939 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Robutanje koruze (2009), Short Circuits (2006) and Piran-Pirano (2010).
biography.name: Boris Cavazza

biography.bio: Anton Petje was born on October 3, 1932 in Gabrovka, Slovenia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976), My Dad, the Socialist Kulak (1987) and Le stade de Wimbledon (2001).
biography.name: Anton Petje

biography.bio: Dare Ulaga was born on February 9, 1931 in Skocjan na Dolenjskem, Slovenia. He was an actor, known for Idealist (1976), Return of Spring (1978) and Blossoms in Autumn (1973). He died on June 30, 1987 in Ljubljana, Slovenia.
biography.name: Dare Ulaga

biography.bio: Radko Polic was born on August 18, 1942 in Crnomelj, Slovenia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Idealist (1976), Night Boats (2012) and Balkan ekspres (1983). He is married to Barbara Levstik. He was previously married to Rozalija Hace and Milena Zupancic.
biography.name: Radko Polic

biography.bio: Dare Valic was born on March 20, 1941 in Banja Luka, Bosnia and Herzegovina. He is an actor, known for To so gadi (1977), Kresnik: The Lore of Fire (2014) and Good to Go (2012).
biography.name: Dare Valic

biography.bio: Boris Kocevar is an actor, known for The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976) and Rdece klasje (1970).
biography.name: Boris Kocevar

biography.bio: Maks Furijan was born on September 19, 1904 in Goricak near Ptuj, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for The Enemy (1965), L'enclos (1960) and La vallée de la paix (1956). He died on July 25, 1993 in Ljubljana, Slovenia.
biography.name: Maks Furijan

biography.bio: Janez Klasinc is an actor, known for Eine zerbrochene Zeit (1994), The Widowhood of Karolina Zasler (1976) and The Upstarts (1953).
biography.name: Janez Klasinc

biography.bio: Peter Ternovsek was born on October 10, 1947 in Maribor, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for We've Never Been to Venice (2008), My Dad, the Socialist Kulak (1987) and Klescar (2002).
biography.name: Peter Ternovsek

awards.award: Pula Film Festival of Yugoslavian Films 1977
